page.title: 16THE HALL, BONAR BRIDGE
page.content: Every two or three weeks there is a {disco}for children in the{Bonar Hall. The price to get in is 35p for under 10s and 50p for 10s and over. You can buy refreshments during the disco. A cup of coke is 10p and a packet of crisps is 5p. We have lots of different records which are played on a double record player. We also have flashing disco lights. Most of the girls wear trousers and a t-shirt or blouse. The boys wear a jumper or t-shirt and jeans. Some Fridays there is{bingo}in the hall. Quite a lot of people go. Sometimes there are{beetle {or whist drives.}During the year there are{sales, drumming lessons, badminton and{concerts}also held in the hall. Overall the hall is very well used.
